Total Equity: stockholder s equity beginning balance restated value

Comprehensive Income: comprehensive income net of tax including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest

Derivatives and Hedging: other comprehensive income unrealized gain loss on derivatives arising during period net of tax
Other OCI: other comprehensive income defined benefit plans adjustment net of tax period increase decrease
other than temporary impairment gains on debt securities
other than temporary impairment losses on debt securities
Total Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss net of tax
Unrealized Gains/Losses on Securities: other comprehensive income unrealized holding gain loss on securities arising during period net of tax
other than temporary impairment losses investments portion in other comprehensive income loss net of tax including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest

Other Equity Adjustments: cumulative effect adjustment from adoption of fspfas1152 and fas1242
cumulative effect of initial adoption of new accounting principle
increase in carrying amount of redeemable preferred stock

Other Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of preferred stock and preference stock
stock issued during period value treasury stock reissued and share based payment arrangement after forfeiture
Total Stock Issuance Value: stock issued during period value new issues

Stock Repurchases: redemption of series n tarp preferred stock other
redemption of series ntarp preferred stock
__unmapped__: common and net treasury stock activity shares
common stock dividends per share declared
stock issued during period shares new issues
stock issued during period shares treasury stock reissued
stock issued during period shares treasury stock reissued and share based payment arrangement after forfeiture
stock redeemed or called during period shares
treasury stock shares net acquired reissued
